31 // Make sure mixture options are set correctly
32 TEST_CASE("Mixture options", "[loading][mixtures]")
33 {
34  GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(TEST_DATA_FOLDER);
35 
36  SECTION("Default options are set when using default constructor") {
37  MixtureOptions opts;
38  CHECK(opts.compositions().size() == 0);
39  CHECK(opts.getDefaultComposition() == -1);
40  CHECK(opts.getMechanism() == "none");
41  CHECK(opts.getSource() == "");
42  CHECK(opts.getSpeciesDescriptor() == "");
43  CHECK(opts.getStateModel() == "ChemNonEq1T");
44  CHECK(opts.getThermalConductivityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
45  CHECK(opts.getThermodynamicDatabase() == "RRHO");
46  CHECK(opts.getViscosityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
47  CHECK(opts.hasDefaultComposition() == false);
48  }
49 
50  SECTION("Default options are set when loading empty mixture") {
51  MixtureOptions opts("default");
52  CHECK(opts.compositions().size() == 0);
53  CHECK(opts.getDefaultComposition() == -1);
54  CHECK(opts.getMechanism() == "none");
55  CHECK(opts.getSource() == Utilities::databaseFileName("default", "mixtures"));
56  CHECK(opts.getSpeciesDescriptor() == "");
57  CHECK(opts.getStateModel() == "ChemNonEq1T");
58  CHECK(opts.getThermalConductivityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
59  CHECK(opts.getThermodynamicDatabase() == "RRHO");
60  CHECK(opts.getViscosityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
61  CHECK(opts.hasDefaultComposition() == false);
62  }
63 
64  SECTION("air11_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T") {
65  MixtureOptions opts("air11_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T");
66 
67  CHECK(opts.compositions().size() == 1);
68  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0].name() == "air");
69  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0].size() == 2);
70  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][0].name == "N");
71  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][0].fraction == 0.79);
72  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][1].name == "O");
73  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][1].fraction == 0.21);
74  CHECK(opts.getDefaultComposition() == 0);
75 
76  CHECK(opts.getMechanism() == "air11_mech");
77  CHECK(opts.getSource() ==
78  Utilities::databaseFileName("air11_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T", "mixtures"));
79  CHECK(opts.getSpeciesDescriptor() == "e- N N+ O O+ NO N2 N2+ O2 O2+ NO+");
80  CHECK(opts.getStateModel() == "ChemNonEq1T");
81  CHECK(opts.getThermalConductivityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
82  CHECK(opts.getThermodynamicDatabase() == "NASA-7");
83  CHECK(opts.getViscosityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
84  CHECK(opts.hasDefaultComposition() == true);
85  }
86 
87  SECTION("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_CG") {
88  MixtureOptions opts("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_CG");
89 
90  CHECK(opts.compositions().size() == 1);
91  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0].name() == "air");
92  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0].size() == 2);
93  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][0].name == "N");
94  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][0].fraction == 0.79);
95  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][1].name == "O");
96  CHECK(opts.compositions()[0][1].fraction == 0.21);
97  CHECK(opts.getDefaultComposition() == 0);
98 
99  CHECK(opts.getMechanism() == "air5_mech");
100  CHECK(opts.getSource() ==
101  Utilities::databaseFileName("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_CG", "mixtures"));
102  CHECK(opts.getSpeciesDescriptor() == "N O NO N2 O2");
103  CHECK(opts.getStateModel() == "ChemNonEq1T");
104  CHECK(opts.getThermalConductivityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_CG");
105  CHECK(opts.getThermodynamicDatabase() == "RRHO");
106  CHECK(opts.getViscosityAlgorithm() == "Chapmann-Enskog_CG");
107  CHECK(opts.hasDefaultComposition() == true);
108  }
109 }
110 
111 // Check that basic data was successfully loaded for the test mixtures, this is
112 // just to make sure that if another test fails, that we should know if it was
113 // because the mixture didn't load.
114 void checkTestMixture(const std::string& name, int ns, int ne, int nr, bool he)
115 {
116  SECTION(name) {
117  Mixture mix(name);
118  CHECK(mix.nSpecies() == ns);
119  CHECK(mix.nElements() == ne);
120  CHECK(mix.nReactions() == nr);
121  CHECK(mix.nHeavy() == (he ? ns - 1 : ns));
122  CHECK(mix.hasElectrons() == he);
123  }
124 }
125 
126 TEST_CASE("Loading test mixtures", "[loading][mixtures]")
127 {
128  GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(TEST_DATA_FOLDER);
129 
130  checkTestMixture("air11_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T", 11, 3, 9, true);
131  checkTestMixture("air11_NASA-9_ChemNonEq1T", 11, 3, 9, true);
132  checkTestMixture("air11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_CG", 11, 3, 9, true);
133  checkTestMixture("air11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_Gupta-Yos", 11, 3, 9, true);
134  checkTestMixture("air11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_Wilke", 11, 3, 9, true);
135  checkTestMixture("air11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T", 11, 3, 9, true);
136  checkTestMixture("air11_RRHO_ChemNonEqTTv", 11, 3, 9, true);
137  checkTestMixture("air5_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T", 5, 2, 4, false);
138  checkTestMixture("air5_NASA-9_ChemNonEq1T", 5, 2, 4, false);
139  checkTestMixture("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_CG", 5, 2, 4, false);
140  checkTestMixture("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_Gupta-Yos", 5, 2, 4, false);
141  checkTestMixture("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T_Wilke", 5, 2, 4, false);
142  checkTestMixture("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T", 5, 2, 4, false);
143  checkTestMixture("air5_RRHO_ChemNonEqTTv", 5, 2, 4, false);
144  checkTestMixture("argon_CR_ChemNonEq1T", 33, 2, 1984, true);
145  checkTestMixture("argon_CR_ChemNonEqTTv", 33, 2, 1984, true);
146 }
147 
148 class CoutRedirect
149 {
150 public:
151  CoutRedirect() :
152  m_buffer(),
153  m_old_buffer(std::cout.rdbuf(m_buffer.rdbuf()))
154  { }
155 
156  ~CoutRedirect() { std::cout.rdbuf(m_old_buffer); }
157 
158  std::string str() { return m_buffer.str(); }
159 private:
160  std::stringstream m_buffer;
161  std::streambuf* m_old_buffer;
162 };
163 
164 void checkLoadMixture(
165  const std::string& mix_name, int ns, int ne, int nr)
166 {
167  std::unique_ptr<Mixture> mix;
168  CHECK_NOTHROW(mix.reset(new Mixture(mix_name)));
169 
170  CHECK(mix->nSpecies() == ns);
171  CHECK(mix->nElements() == ne);
172  CHECK(mix->nReactions() == nr);
173 
174  {
175  CoutRedirect cout;
176  CHECK_NOTHROW(mix->collisionDB().Q11ij());
177  INFO("standard out =\n" << cout.str());
178  CHECK(cout.str().find("Warning") == std::string::npos);
179  }
180 }
181 
182 TEST_CASE("Loading air_5 mixture", "[loading][mixtures]")
183 {
184  checkLoadMixture("air_5", 5, 2, 5);
185 }
186 
187 TEST_CASE("Loading air_11 mixture", "[loading][mixtures]")
188 {
189  checkLoadMixture("air_11", 11, 3, 22);
190 }
191 
192 TEST_CASE("Loading Mars_19 mixture", "[loading][mixtures]")
193 {
194  checkLoadMixture("Mars_19", 19, 4, 27);
195 }
196 
197 TEST_CASE("Loading tacot-air_35 mixture", "[loading][mixtures]")
198 {
199  checkLoadMixture("tacot-air_35", 35, 4, 0);
200 }
